title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Oct 29 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Oct 29 2021
description:
Forget the shark, Biden has jumped the whale on bad decision making with a new border policy. What the VA governor’s race could predict about future elections. Allison Williams explains walking from a successful career at ESPN over the vaccine mandate and why this matters to all Americans. And former President Donald Trump explains why he’s starting a new social media platform (TRUTH Social), vaccine mandates, the border, how Biden makes Jimmy Carter look good, his favorite candy and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
